sub_title: Application Engineer @ Pharrowtech | RF Systems Expert | Python Developer | PhD in Electrical Engineering
summary:
At Pharrowtech, I support the development and optimization of 60 GHz RF systems for wireless connectivity. My dual expertise in RF engineering and software development ensures that our products meet the highest quality standards. I am deeply involved in PCB design and also take charge of developing and maintaining Python (Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, Scikit-learn,Tkinter, Logging, Pytest, Pyinstaller) scripts for GUI, testing, packaging and executable release, utilizing tools like Altium, Docker, Jenkins, and Jira.

With a PhD in Electrical Engineering from TU Eindhoven, I've extensively researched RF/mmWave IC, PCB, and Antenna Design. My 8+ years post-bachelor experience has equipped me with proficiency in electronic design tools such as Cadence, Keysight, and Ansys, and a strong foundation in web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and JSON.

Passionate about wireless communication systems, emerging technologies like 5G, IoT, AI, and software development, I'm actively seeking roles where I can amalgamate my RF and Python development skills to drive innovation and impact.

contributors.headline: Application Engineer @ Pharrowtech | RF Systems Expert | Python Developer | PhD in Electrical Engineering

profile_positions.description:
● Provided exceptional customer and partner technical support throughout the product development lifecycle of 60 GHz RF systems, utilizing Jira for efficient issue tracking and management.

● Proficiently assisted with PCB design and conducted thorough reviews using Altium, ensuring the highest quality standards were met.

● Skillfully developed and maintained Python scripts for GUI, testing, packaging, external release, utilizing Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, Tkinter, Logging, PyTest, PyInstaller Modules & Libraries, Docker & Jenkins for continuous integration and Bitbuket & Git for version control.

● Demonstrated a commitment to excellence by generating comprehensive and well-structured documentation for all deliverables and collaterals produced.
profile_positions.title: Application Engineer

profile_positions.description:
● 2.5D / 3D Layout Modelling/simulation of IC, package,  PCB and Antenna with focus on EMC (signal and power integrity) and RF / mmWave up to 100 GHz. 

● Improvement development and benchmarking of design flows using a variety of commercial electronic design tools including  Cadence Virtuoso, Virtuoso RF EMX / Clarity,  Keysight ADS, RFPro, EMPro and Ansys HFSS.
profile_positions.title: Design Flow and Modeling Engineer

profile_positions.description:
● Characterized various RF antenna systems using VNA, Muti-probe chamber,
Octoscope and MVG MiniLab. Created RF antenna test reports covering
S-parameter, radiation pattern, gain, efficiency, conducted power, total radiated
power and total isotropic sensitivity using Python.

● Design/optimization of RF Boards using ADS momentum and CST. This included
coplanar wave transmission lines for UHF, LTE and Wifi bands to ensure high
isolation between antenna elements. The coplanar wave transmission lines were
shielded by making picket fences around the transmission lines for high isolation.

● Facilitated interoperability between ADS momentum and CST for 2.5/3D EM
modelling RF design. RF boards were designed in ADS and imported into CST and
also designed antennas boards in CST were imported into ADS for further
optimization. Created solder paste layer of mmwave 64- element antenna array in
ADS at 28 GHz
profile_positions.title: RF Test Engineer

profile_positions.description:
● Designed 2 demonstrator boards for proof of concept of low-power inductive transfer.
● Simulated and designed body-worn UWB Antenna in CST up to 6 GHz.
● Implemented Custom ASIC for UWB Transceiver on CMOS 180nm Technology in Cadence (DRC, LVS, Calibre).
● Developed PCB for custom IC testing in Eagle Software.
● Supervised 1 graduating student working on research project.
profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
● Meta-material backed Antenna for Body-worn Applications at 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz.
● Proposed novel meta-material backed antenna for off-body application using CST and FEKO.
● Manufactured prototype antenna, showing over 30% improvement in efficiency.
● Performed full antenna measurement.
profile_positions.title: Antenna Design Engineer Intern

profile_positions.description:
● RF Indoor Positioning System using RSSI Fingerprints
● Processed, organized data for RSSI fingerprinting.
● Programmed 3 RSSI fingerprinting algorithms in Matlab.
● Improved performance by 10% combining other positioning techniques.
profile_positions.title: R&D Intern

● Developed and improved personally in technical training on IT front-end development in 3 sections.
● Collaborated with lead instructor to identify key areas necessitating training based on software and equipment design in 2 subject areas.
profile_positions.title: ICT Trainer

profile_positions.description:
● Educated over 120 students in 6 classes on basic engineering principles applying variety of instructional techniques.
● Evaluated and revised 13 lesson plans and course content to facilitate and moderate classroom discussions and student-centred learning.
● Mentored 4 graduating students on transitioning into engineering undergraduate programs.
profile_positions.title: ICT Teacher
